item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, February 28, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US to raise tariffs on China and push ahead with Canada and Mexico levies
2. US and UK in talks on trade deal that could spare Britain from tariffs
3. Trump revives Canada’s Liberals in electoral turnaround
4. Tate brothers arrive in US after Romania lifts travel ban
5. After chiding US allies, Trump lavishes praise on ‘special’ Starmer
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, February 28, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
